name: PONG-Retro
description:
Experience the past in this lovingly re-created arcade game from the years before the personal computer.

PONG-Retro brings back the original game with only a few changes to the game experience.

The game runs in a 640 x 480 windowed screen.

Just run the installer and click the desktop icon to warp back to the past!

Or if you just want to play the game online, visit Lazy Mutt Games online arcade: https://lazymuttgames.com/games/pong-retro/demo

"Pong is one of the earliest arcade video games. It is a table tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. The game was originally manufactured by Atari, which released it in 1972. Allan Alcorn created Pong as a training exercise assigned to him by Atari co-founder Nolan Bushnell." - Wikipedia
